name: NO SPACE FOR A NAME
description:
NO SPACE FOR A NAME is a game I made for the Ludum Dare 42  game jam which had the theme: Running out of space.

Yeah I know a very original name XD

In the game, you have to free up space, by collecting it in the levels, which get filled up by the ever expanding junk. So you have to maneuver your way through the levels with the help of your ability to take size from the junk.

-Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Aim: Mouse cursor
  • Take size from junk: MB1 (Left mouse button)
  • Give size from you to junk: MB2 (Right mouse button)
  • Restart level: R
  • Exit and stuff if you want to leave or something: Escape (ESC)
  • Resetting the game: CTRL+SHIFT+R

-Credits:

  • Art, Design, programming, sound FX: Gaweringo
  • Music: Free download/instrumental from/by 2Bough (very nice stuff)

If WebGL (best in Fullscreen (F11)) doesn't work try the downloadable.
